name: Italian Java Objects
short_description:
Java source codes written in italian language for students and learners who'd like to approach from an Italian language perspective this fascinating programming environment.
Created using NetBeans for students, to help them to understand the basis of the Java Object Oriented Language, these objects can be expanded by any student who'd like to collaborate.

Codici Sorgenti in Java scritti facendo uso della lingua italiana, per studenti e discenti che desiderano approfondire il linguaggio Java. Realizzati con NetBeans dallo scrittore fantasy Usai Luigi, co-autore di Stigmergy con Carlo Usai e autore di "Riflessioni sul metodo cartesiano e la pratica musicale" e di "Verona e la sua Giulietta".
Java源代码写在意大利的语言，为学生和学生，他们想从意大利语言的角度来看，接近这个迷人的编程环境。
summary: Java source codes written in italian language for students and learner

audience.fullpath: Intended Audience :: by Industry or Sector :: Information Technology
Intended Audience :: by Industry or Sector :: Education
